subject: Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Allegations that Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel signed autographs for money has heightened public sentiment that is increasingly hostile over the N.C.A.A.’s amateurism rule.
snippet: Allegations that Texas A&M quarterback Johnny Manziel signed autographs for money has heightened public sentiment that is increasingly hostile over the N.C.A.A.’s amateurism rule.
